alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 15 at 1:47PM MDT until September 17 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER CONCERNS INCREASING FOR SUNDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 134, 135, 136, AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 134, 135, 136, and 137. * WIND...West at 15 to 20 mph * HUMIDITY...as low as 9 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge
